fullText: Pryce and Atkins are magnificent as André and Madeleine, a French couple in their 80s whose 50-year marriage is being tested by his increasing dementia.
dtliExcerpt: Pryce and Atkins are magnificent as André and Madeleine, a French couple in their 80s whose 50-year marriage is being tested by his increasing dementia.
bwwExcerpt: You have to admit that a playwright could do worse than creating a juicy acting exercise for treasurable actors in their 70s (Mr. Pryce) and 80s (Ms. Atkins). Does it matter so much that for all their skill - set off by Mr. Kent's exquisitely decorous Broadway staging - there's no there there? It do...
showScoreExcerpt: Pryce and Atkins are magnificent as André and Madeleine, a French couple in their 80s whose 50-year marriage is being tested by his increasing dementia.
